title: Hoarded by the Dragon
description: A thief doing a final job and the dragon caught in a precarious situation that changes both of their lives.He’s powerful and wealthy and he hates me.But I have something he wants.It wasn’t a part of the plan.I’m the thief stupid enough to break into a dragon’s hoard… and walk away pregnant with his baby.More details to come...
author: Lillian Lark
